tool.name: FFEval
tool.description: Evaluation tool for feature detection algorithms.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir truth && ln -s '$truth' 'truth/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $truth.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($truth.ext)' && #if $out_FLAG: mkdir out && #end if #if $abort_reasons: mkdir abort_reasons && ln -s '$abort_reasons' 'abort_reasons/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $abort_reasons.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($abort_reasons.ext)' && #end if #if $out_roc_FLAG: mkdir out_roc && #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && echo ARGS && cat '$args_json' && echo HARD && cat '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -truth 'truth/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $truth.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($truth.ext)' #if $out_FLAG: -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("featurexml")}' #end if #if $abort_reasons: -abort_reasons 'abort_reasons/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $abort_reasons.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($abort_reasons.ext)' #end if #if $out_roc_FLAG: -out_roc 'out_roc/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' #end if #if not($out_FLAG) and not($out_roc_FLAG): | tee '$stdout' #end if
## Postprocessing #if $out_FLAG: && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("featurexml")}' '$out' #end if #if $out_roc_FLAG: && mv 'out_roc/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' '$out_roc' #end if #if $adv_opts_cond.adv_opts_selector=='advanced' and $adv_opts_cond.ctd_out_FLAG && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: in
param.label: Feature input file, which contains the data to be tested against the truth file

param.name: truth
param.label: Truth feature file that defines what features should be found

param.name: rt_tol
param.label: Allowed tolerance of RT relative to average feature RT span

param.name: rt_tol_abs
param.label: Allowed absolute tolerance of RT (overwrites 'rt_tol' if set above zero)

param.name: mz_tol
param.label: Allowed tolerance in m/z (is divided by charge)

param.name: out_FLAG
param.label: Generate output out (Feature output file)
param.help: If given, an annotated input file is written

param.name: abort_reasons
param.label: Feature file containing seeds with abort reasons

param.name: out_roc_FLAG
param.label: Generate output out_roc (If given, a ROC curve file is created (ROC points based on intensity threshold))

param.name: test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Evaluation tool for feature detection algorithms.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/documentation/UTILS_FFEval.html
